name: The DeskTop Shindows 10 Edition
description:
This game is a game where you can just about do anything you want to do, You can open noogle and watch the stupid videos on youpipe, You can also get cussed at by people on faceshook, You can get viruses that want to kill you and take all you're money, and also hacked and all the good fun things like in real life, There will be many mini games some just a joke, and some a really cool mini game, The DeskTop Shindows 10 Edition is about anything you want it to be, You can just about do anything like in real life.





This game also has





  • Life like loading screens for fake rip off games
  • Viruses (not real ones)
  • PC problems
  • 5 Year old's cussing at you kinda
  • A stupid amount of weird things to do
  • A lot of endings that are not really endings
  • Weird videos on youpipe
  • Dark humor
  • Crashes (JuSt liKe rEaL liFe)
  • Memes
How hard it is to run?
You will get 60 fps on this game, If you can't then how could you call yourself a gamer???





Is there bad spelling?
Now miss spellings I can fix but if you want to place , . , . <--- These better then go find another game to play





Is it worth downloading?





  • Does it have hours on hours of gameplay? A few
  • Does it have good art: No....
  • Does it have good music: No....
  • Does it have good jokes: Yes!
  • Does it have mini games: Yes!
  • Is it made for minors: Yes but some might get offended (I don't really care if you do)
  • Does it have other players on it: No....

There now give it a shot because my hands hurt from typing all this at 3 AM
